definition:
Everybody remembers the cosine values
$$\cos 0 = 1,\quad \cos(\pm\pi) = -1,\quad \cos(\pm2\pi) = 1,\quad \cos(\pm3\pi) = -1,\,\,...$$
The thing can be concisely expressed as the $$\cos{n\pi} = (-1)^n$$ for
each integer $n$. The values of sine at the same angles are simply 0.
phrase: Cosine At Multiples Of Straight Angle
